column5: Here's a video blog on ice fishing Lake St. Clair.  http://www.freep.com/wendlandvideo
that was a nice vid to get the blood going to get out on the ice to bad he sounds like he is about to fall asleep when talking to the fisherman none the less I am pumped to get out

That reporter isn't a fisherman so the idea of icefishing probably bores him. He writes tech articles not fishing. He just likes to play with his new tech gadgets then writes a weekly colum about them.
